[quote:nc3if08u]this is a very annoying game.

Rating: * [/quote:nc3if08u]

A pretty interesting storyline yet only warrants 1 out of 5? emojo, you wound me! If I didn't know better, I'd swear you were giving me a bad review because I didn't like your game. Oh, the shame of it all!

So beware the dog- er, crap game writers. They bite.
